name: TerseNews
0:
”Alexa, ask Terse News for headlines”
”latest news on Sports”
”Detail on First”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: terse news
des:
Terse News Alexa skill. Stay informed briefly in form and also comprehensively in scope, in and under under 60 words. This skill supports following categories.

1. National (Indian News)
2. Sports
3. World
4. Politics
5. Business
6. Technology
7. Science
8. Startup
9. Automobile
10. Entertainment
11. Miscellaneous
12. Hatke

Here are some examples 
Ask Terse News, for today's headlines
Ask Terse News, for latest news from India
Ask Terse News, for recent news on Politics
Ask Terse News, to get detail on First headline
Ask Terse News, to get further details on Last headline
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
